title: How to Make Halloween Pumpkin Punch

steps.headline: Hollow out your pumpkin.
steps.description: Once hollowed, you can decorate with a black magic marker (make sure that it is not toxic), paper cutouts, or just go "pumpkin naturel" if it's not Halloween.

steps.headline: Make apple balls.
steps.description:
Form little balls from the apple using a melon baller. steps.headline: Spice the apples.
steps.description: Spike each ball through the center with a clove.

steps.headline: Mix it all together.Combine the apple, pineapple, and lemon juice with the apple/clove balls and cinnamon stick in a saucepan over medium heat.
Serve!
steps.description: Pour the Halloween Pumpkin punch into the hollowed pumpkin and serve!

text:
Hollow out your pumpkin. Once hollowed, you can decorate with a black magic marker (make sure that it is not toxic), paper cutouts, or just go "pumpkin naturel" if it's not Halloween. Make apple balls. Form little balls from the apple using a melon baller. Place the apple balls into a bowl. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Spice the apples. Spike each ball through the center with a clove. Mix it all together.Combine the apple, pineapple, and lemon juice with the apple/clove balls and cinnamon stick in a saucepan over medium heat. Give it a quick stir and heat for a few minutes until warm. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/36/Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/36/Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Remove it from the heat. You can let it cool, or you can serve it nice and warm. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/27/Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet2.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Halloween-Pumpkin-Punch-Step-4Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Serve! Pour the Halloween Pumpkin punch into the hollowed pumpkin and serve!
